item.description:
Ok so you didn't get out on Valentines day, no special some one to celebrate with well then lets all go out tonight and have our own celebration and recreate VALENTINES DAY!!! Lets Hit the dance floor and cut up a rug!! Who knows ya just might find the LOVE of your life tonight!!

If you want to come for dinner get here by 7pm so we can round up some tables and nibble on some munchies, or if you just want to dance get here when ever, either way your in for a fun night. (small cover 5.00 after 7:30)

This venue has two fantastic floors where we can dance!!dance!! dance!!

WildFire has been entertaining audiences around New England for over a decade.

Sought after for their powerful dynamic vocals, versatile musical selections and high-energy interactive performances, the band can be found performing at clubs throughout the North Shore Massachusetts and New England area.

Band: Wildfire

Time: 9-1:00am
item.name: Be Ready To Rock UnValentine with "WILDFIRE" at Cappones
